item.title: My Notes For R
item.description: Live Dangerously. Problem I ran into a strange problem today. From a deep buried memory I remember that R supports import from compressed gzip files. So I compressed a tab file(MAF file, ~ 1.5G ) and tried to read it using fread and read.table. fread failed. read.table succeeded, but only half of the rows are read in. Whatâ€™s worse, when tried to generate a table using table(df$XXX), the R session ate up all my memory and crushed.
